examples: he moved his family to Virginia
It was a good Christian household
I waited until the whole house was asleep
the teacher asked how many people made up his home

definitions.text: primary social group; parents and children
examples: he wanted to have a good job before starting a family

definitions.text: a collection of things sharing a common attribute
examples: there are two classes of detergents

definitions.text: people descended from a common ancestor
examples: his family has lived in Massachusetts since the Mayflower

definitions.text: a person having kinship with another or others
(biology) a taxonomic group containing one or more genera
examples: sharks belong to the fish family

definitions.text: a loose affiliation of gangsters in charge of organized criminal activities
an association of people who share common beliefs or activities
examples: the message was addressed not just to employees but to every member of the company family
the church welcomed new members into its fellowship
